text: The women's 4x400 metres relay event at the 1994 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Lisbon, Portugal, at Estádio Universitário de Lisboa on 23 and 24 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Cicely Scott Monique Hennagan Michelle Brown Jowanna McMullen ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Marinella Mircea Lavinia Miroiu Andrea Burlacu Ionela Tîrlea ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Susanne Merkel Claudia Angerhausen Ivonne Teichmann Ulrike Urbansky ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 24 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 1994 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Women's 4 × 400 metres relay
